cause.description:
Too many families are broken up, so the Childrens Aid Society can obtain more funding. I have witnessed this myself. Please sign the petition at http://www.thepetitionsite.com/takeaction/399344183 and help end the suffering these families have to endure. There is no better custodian for a child than a family member
1. families must be reunited
2. end the corruption
3. sign the petition
cause.name: Take Action
